alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Bibb; Chilton; Dallas; Hale; Perry; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Autauga, southwestern Chilton, south central Tuscaloosa, northeastern Perry, northeastern Hale, Bibb and northeastern Dallas Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 330 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Moundville to near Mulberry. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brent, Valley Grande, Centreville, Coaling, Maplesville, Billingsley, Vida Junction, Gardner Island, Parnell, West Centreville, Heiberger, Plecher, Lawley, Mulberry, Paul M Grist State Park, Low Gap, Mertz, Talladega National Forest, Eoline and Chilton County Motor Sports Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Autauga; Bibb; Chilton; Dallas; Hale; Perry; Tuscaloosa
